monster.name: Arctic Fox

trait.name: Keen Sight and Smell
trait.text: The arctic fox has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight or smell.

trait.name: Artic Coat
trait.text: The arctic fox has resistance to cold damage, and has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in Arctic terrain.

trait.name: Find Familiar
trait.text: With the DM's permission, a character who casts the 'Find Familiar' spell can choose to summon an artic fox.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., 1 target. Hit: 1 piercing damage.

monster.description:
The arctic fox (Vulpes lagopus), also known as the white fox, polar fox, or snow fox, is well adapted to living in cold environments, and is best known for its thick, warm fur that is also used as camouflage.
Source: DnDBeyond Unearthed Arcana (Homebrew)

monster.name: Penguin

trait.name: Hold Breath
trait.text: The penguin can hold its breath for 30 minutes.

trait.name: Find Familiar
trait.text: With the DM's permission, a character who casts the 'Find Familiar' spell can choose to summon a penguin.

action.name: Peck
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +1 to hit, reach 5 ft., 1 target. Hit: 1 (1d4-1) piercing damage.

monster.description:
Penguins are arctic or costal flightless birds. They are social animals, gathering in large groups together. They are often curious about their surroundings.
Source: DnDBeyond Unearthed Arcana (Homebrew)

monster.name: Jetpack Penguin
monster.speed: walk 10 ft. swim 40 ft., fly 40 ft.

trait.name: Flyby
trait.text: The jetpack penguin doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

trait.name: Hold Breath
trait.text: The jetpack penguin can hold its breath for 30 minutes.

trait.name: Find Familiar
trait.text: With the DM's permission, a character who casts the 'Find Familiar' spell can choose to summon a jetpack penguin.
